headline.print_headline: Jets Turn Backs on a Game That Slipped Right Through Their Hands
headline.seo: Jets Turn Backs on Game That Slipped Right Through Their Hands
headline.main: Jets Turn Backs on a Game That Slipped Right Through Their Hands

docs.snippet: The Jets’ defense, expected to carry the team while it installs a new offense, struggled in Sunday’s loss to the Steelers....
docs.abstract: New York Jets defense fails to live up to expectations in a 27-10 loss to the Pittsburgh Steelers.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Jets’ defense, expected to carry the team while it installs a new offense, struggled in Sunday’s loss to the Steelers.

headline.print_headline: M.T.A. Chief’s Latest Bold Move: Using Twitter by Himself
headline.seo: Joseph Lhota, M.T.A. Chief, Tweets to His Delight
headline.main: M.T.A. Chief’s Latest Bold Move: Using Twitter by Himself

docs.snippet: The chairman of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority is unfettered compared with most public officials on Twitter, who usually have a team operating their account....
docs.abstract: Twitter account belonging to Metropolitan Transportation Authority chairman Joseph J Lhota stands apart in both volume and content from those of other prominent officials; Lhota, who has made the bold move of choosing to Twitter by himself without oversight from advisers or editors, is supplying a sometimes startling glimpse into his personal history and habits as he types away.
docs.lead_paragraph: The chairman of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority is unfettered compared with most public officials on Twitter, who usually have a team operating their account.

docs.snippet: Proving which initiatives work could turn the state into a model for others on how to cut Medicaid without harming the beneficiaries....
docs.abstract: Editorial holds New York State has substantially changed its Medicaid program in ways likely to improve the health of its poorest residents and rein in its enormous costs; urges Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services to allow the state to use the $10 billion in projected federal savings from its reforms, which, if spent wisely, could turn New York into a model on how to cut Medicaid without harming beneficiaries.
docs.lead_paragraph: Proving which initiatives work could turn the state into a model for others on how to cut Medicaid without harming the beneficiaries.

headline.print_headline: On a Challenging Day, Romney Seeks to Shift to His Policy Specifics
headline.main: On a Challenging Day, Romney Seeks to Shift to His Policy Specifics

docs.snippet: Until now, Mitt Romney’s campaign had been focused almost entirely on criticizing President Obama....
docs.abstract: Political ads intended to give Mitt Romney's campaign new direction are overshadowed by a video of his unscripted remarks at a May fund-raiser; attention paid to the video--in which he described 47 percent of Americans as having a victim mentality and a dependency on government--further complicates his efforts to bring a sharper focus to his campaign and address tensions within his staff.

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and ASHLEY PARKER
byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro, Michael D. Shear and Jeff Zeleny contributed reporting.

docs.lead_paragraph: Until now, Mitt Romney’s campaign had been focused almost entirely on criticizing President Obama.

headline.print_headline: Restoring the Walls, And the History, At Hitler’s Wolf’s Lair
headline.seo: Restoring the Walls, and History, at a Hitler Command Post
headline.main: Restoring the Walls, and the History, at Hitler’s Wolf’s Lair

docs.snippet: The Polish government has decided that the Wolf’s Lair, the outpost where Hitler commanded the Third Reich for years, holds valuable history lessons that need to be preserved....
docs.abstract: Ketrzyn Journal; Polish government has decided that the Wolf's Lair, outpost in Ketrzyn from which Hitler commanded the Third Reich, holds valuable history lessons that need to be preserved; Polish Ministry of Culture and National Heritage has demanded that the company running the site transform it into a historical and education destination.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Polish government has decided that the Wolf’s Lair, the outpost where Hitler commanded the Third Reich for years, holds valuable history lessons that need to be preserved.

headline.print_headline: Widow Seeks to Unseat New Jersey Congressman Who Ousted Her Husband in ’10
headline.seo: Personal Ties in Adler vs. Runyan Congressional Race in New Jersey
headline.main: Widow Takes On Congressman Who Ousted Her Husband

docs.snippet: Shelley Adler is challenging Representative Jon Runyan, who rode a wave of Tea Party support to unseat her husband in New Jersey’s Third District in 2010....
docs.abstract: Democrat Shelley Adler, widow of former Rep John H Adler of New Jersey, is challenging Republican incumbent Rep Jon Runyan for the state's Third Congressional District seat; Runyan rode a wave of Tea Party support to unseat Adler's husband in 2010.
docs.lead_paragraph: Shelley Adler is challenging Representative Jon Runyan, who rode a wave of Tea Party support to unseat her husband in New Jersey’s Third District in 2010.

headline.print_headline: Some Call It Injury Risk; Schiano Calls It Clean Football
headline.seo: Greg Schiano, Buccaneers Coach, Defends Final Play of Loss to Giants
headline.main: Bucs’ Schiano Defends Final Play of Loss to Giants

docs.snippet: To some, Coach Greg Schiano crossed an unspoken line Sunday when his defensive unit crashed the Giants’ victory formation in the final seconds of their 41-34 win....
docs.abstract: Tampa Bay Buccaneers coach Greg Schiano is unapologetic for instructing his defensive to charge across the line of scrimmage and crash the New York Giants’ victory kneel on the last play of their 41-34 win; Giants coach Tom Coughlin and several football analysts have bristled at the play call, calling it unnecessary injury risk.
docs.lead_paragraph: To some, Coach Greg Schiano crossed an unspoken line Sunday when his defensive unit crashed the Giants’ victory formation in the final seconds of their 41-34 win.
